body_html:
@rmlarsen any update on the status on this PR?

We have atleast 3 more PRs which we need to renew and for which this PR is a pre-req. Worried that we will not be able to merge in all the PRs needed to enable ROCm support, before the cutoff for TF 2.0. Wondering if there is anything we can do on our end to speed things up.

Thanks
